Description: Studio in the heart of Beacon Hill. Located just a short distance from the MGH/Charles St. T-Stop, CVS, Whole Foods, and many local restaurants and stores. You can't beat this Beacon Hill location! This charming studio features large windows, a decorative fireplace on exposed brick, original crown molding, and hardwood floors throughout. Smoke-free building with a superintendent on-site. Laundry directly across the street. Heat and hot water included! Available for 10/1. Sorry, no pets or undergrads are allowed.
